task_completion.description: Rate the success rate of task completion in the given Alfworld scenario

valid_actions.description: Rate the percentage of valid actions taken in the Alfworld scenario

action_efficiency.description: Rate the efficiency of the actions taken to complete the task in the Alfworld scenario

thought_process_quality.description: Rate the quality of the thought process used to reason about next actions

response_format.description: Determine if the response format is followed strictly (THOUGHT, ACTION, TERMINATE)

adaptability.description: Rate the ability to adapt to changes and feedback given by the environment
